content.question: A parabola given by <math alttext="open parentheses y plus 4 close parentheses squared equals 1 half open parentheses x minus 3 close parentheses"><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> is graphed in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane. The graph of which of the following in the same <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane is identical to the graph of the parabola?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals negative 4 plus square root of 1 half open parentheses x minus 3 close parentheses end root"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="y equals negative 4 minus square root of 1 half open parentheses x minus 3 close parentheses end root"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></msqrt></math>
<math alttext="x equals 2 y squared plus 16 y plus 35"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>35</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x equals 2 y squared plus 16 y plus 35"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>35</mn></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
